description: MainActivity.kt defines the main user interface and interaction logic for an Android TV number guessing game. It programmatically constructs a focusable, TV-optimized UI with buttons for digits and actions, manages focus navigation, updates UI based on view model state, and handles user input via DPAD navigation and button clicks.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The primary activity managing the Android TV number guessing game's UI and interactions, emphasizing focus management for TV navigation.

methods.name: setLinearNavigation
methods.description: Configures focus navigation within a vertical LinearLayout of rows, establishing left/right and up/down focus relationships to ensure logical TV navigation.

methods.name: setRowNavigation
methods.description: Configures left/right focus navigation within a single horizontal LinearLayout row.

methods.name: idOrAssign
methods.description: Ensures a view has a unique ID, assigning one if necessary.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels (dp) to actual pixel values based on device density.

methods.name: buildTvButton
methods.description: Creates a styled, focusable Button optimized for TV interaction with customizable color scheme.

methods.name: playClick
methods.description: Plays a click sound effect for button presses, if supported.

methods.name: focusableSurfaceBackground
methods.description: Returns a GradientDrawable for focusable background surfaces with styling.

methods.name: tvButtonBackground
methods.description: Returns a StateListDrawable providing different button backgrounds for normal, focused, and pressed states.

methods.name: darken
methods.description: Darkens a given color by a specified factor to create pressed or focus states.
